Name: Lemonhead
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE lemongrass in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
History: Created in 2006 by yours truly. This was originally a Lemon Martini; every cocktail was named "Martini" back then .
